mapper.select: select DISTINCT p.etp_cd,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,e.etp_addr,e.etp_nm,i.etp_if_img_path,to_char(e.etp_content) etp_content,e.etp_lat,e.etp_lnt from(select s.pd_cd from stock s where to_date(substr(s.st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') Minus select pd_cd from stock where st_this_num = 0 and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD')) a, stock s, product p , enterprise e , enterprise_info i where a.pd_cd = s.pd_cd and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') and e.etp_cd = p.etp_cd and s.pd_cd = p.pd_cd and p.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_addr like '%'||#{address}||'%' and e.etp_cd like 'h'||'%'

select DISTINCT p.pd_cd,p.pd_nm,p.pd_price,to_char(p.pd_content) pd_content,p.pd_img_path from product p, stock s where p.pd_cd = s.pd_cd and p.etp_cd = #{code} and to_date(substr(s.st_cd,-5),'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in},'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out},'MM-DD') order by p.pd_price
select * from member where user_id = #{user}
select to_date(#{out},'MM/DD')-to_date(#{in},'MM/DD') from dual

select a.user_id,a.rb_contents, to_char(a.rb_dt,'YY/MM/DD HH24:mi:ss') rb_dt_char ,a.rb_avg,b.user_nm from (select * from reviewboard where etp_cd = #{etpcode}) a , member b where a.user_id = b.user_id
select NVL(to_number(to_char(avg(rb_avg),'FM9.9')),0) rb_avg from reviewboard where etp_cd = #{etp_cd}
select p.pd_nm,p.pd_price from enterprise e,product p where e.etp_cd = p.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = #{etp_cd} order by p.pd_price

select DISTINCT e.etp_nm,e.etp_addr,e.etp_ph_no,e.etp_lat,e.etp_lnt,to_char(e.etp_content) etp_content,i.etp_if_img_path,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,e.etp_cd from enterprise e , product po , orders o ,enterprise_info i where po.etp_cd = e.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_addr like '%'||#{location}||'%' and e.etp_cd like '%'||'f'||'%' MINUS select DISTINCT e.etp_nm,e.etp_addr,e.etp_ph_no,e.etp_lat,e.etp_lnt,to_char(e.etp_content) etp_content,i.etp_if_img_path,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,e.etp_cd from (select o.*,p.etp_cd,p.pd_nm from product p , orders o where p.pd_cd = o.pd_cd) po , enterprise e , enterprise_info i where po.etp_cd = e.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_addr like '%'||#{location}||'%' and e.etp_cd like '%'||'f'||'%' and (or_dt in(to_timestamp(#{day},'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) and or_dt2 in(to_timestamp(to_char(to_timestamp(#{day},'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')+1/24,'YY/MM/DD HH24:Mi'),'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')))
select p.pd_nm,p.pd_price from enterprise e,product p where e.etp_cd = p.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = #{etp_cd} and p.ca_cd = (select ca_cd from procategory where ca_cd = '4') order by p.pd_price

select t.*,m.user_nm from (select e.user_id,e.etp_addr,e.etp_ph_no,e.etp_license_no,e.etp_nm,e.etp_email,e.etp_lat,e.etp_lnt,i.* from enterprise e, enterprise_info i where e.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = #{decodeResult}) t,member m where t.user_id = m.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into orders (or_cd,user_id,pd_cd,or_dt,or_dt2,th_dt,or_price,or_stat,or_check) values ( ORDER_SEQ.nextval, #{user}, (select pd_cd from product where pd_nm=#{pro} and etp_cd=#{code}), to_timestamp(#{day},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), to_timestamp(to_char(to_timestamp(#{day},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')+1/24,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), systimestamp, #{price}, 1, 1)
mapper.select: select e.etp_nm,to_char(o.or_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') chardate,to_char(o.or_dt2,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') chardate2, to_char(o.th_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') charthisdate,o.or_price,o.or_stat,o.or_cd,p.pd_nm from orders o , enterprise e,product p where e.etp_cd=#{code} and o.user_id=#{user} and o.or_dt= to_timestamp(#{day},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') and p.pd_cd = o.pd_cd order by o.or_cd

select DISTINCT e.etp_cd, e.etp_addr,e.etp_nm, e.etp_lat,e.etp_lnt,i.etp_if_img_path,i.etp_if_time1, i.etp_if_time2,to_char(e.etp_content) etp_content from enterprise e, hospitalcategory h, enterprise_info i where i.etp_cd = e.etp_cd and h.etp_cd = e.etp_cd and ( h.etp_ct = #{item1} or h.etp_ct = #{item2} or h.etp_ct = #{item3} or h.etp_ct = #{item4} or h.etp_ct = #{item5} or h.etp_ct = #{item6} or h.etp_ct = #{item7} ) order by e.etp_cd
select e.etp_cd,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,i.etp_if_hos_time from enterprise e, enterprise_info i where e.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_cd = (select etp_cd from enterprise where etp_nm= #{etp_nm})

select to_char(hor_dt_f,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') hor_dt_cf , to_char(hor_dt_l,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') hor_dt_cl from hospitalorders where etp_cd = #{code} and hor_dt_f between to_timestamp(#{day1},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') and to_timestamp(#{day2},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
mapper.insert: insert into hospitalorders values ('HO'||to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')||HOS_ORDER_SEQ.nextval, (select etp_cd from enterprise where etp_nm = #{etp_cd}), #{user_id}, to_timestamp(#{hor_dt_cf},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_timestamp(#{hor_dt_cl},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 1, 1, #{hor_pet_cd}, #{hor_detail})
mapper.select: select hor_cd from hospitalorders where etp_cd = (select etp_cd from enterprise where etp_nm=#{etp_cd}) and hor_dt_f = to_timestamp(#{hor_dt_cf},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')
